subject: Re: [junit] XUnit Framework
msgSnippet: On Thu, 2 Sep 2004 06:33:40 +0300, Allan Halme  ... Actually, the original was SUnit for Smalltalk. ;) -- Jason Rogers I am crucified
messageBody:
On Thu, 2 Sep 2004 06:33:40 +0300, Allan Halme <allan.halme@...>
wrote:

> xUnit refers to the family of Extreme Programming -inspired unit
> testing frameworks that have arisen since the original JUnit became
> popular. See Ron Jeffries' listing at
> http://www.xprogramming.com/software.htm under "Unit Testing".

Actually, the original was SUnit for Smalltalk. ;)

--
Jason Rogers

"I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I,
but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in
the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved
me, and gave himself for me."
Galatians 2:20
